TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit DynamicObject extends System.Object implements class System.Dynamic.IDynamicMetaObjectProvider

summary.span: 提供用于在运行时指定动态行为的基类。

span.span: Provides a base class for specifying dynamic behavior at run time.

summary.span: 必须继承此类；不能直接对其进行实例化。

span.span: This class must be inherited from; you cannot instantiate it directly.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `DynamicObject`类可以定义可动态对象上执行哪些操作以及如何执行这些操作。The `DynamicObject` class enables you to define which operations can be performed on dynamic objects and how to perform those operations. 例如，可以定义当尝试获取或设置对象属性、 调用方法，或执行标准的数学运算，例如加法和乘法时，会发生什么情况。For example, you can define what happens when you try to get or set an object property, call a method, or perform standard mathematical operations such as addition and multiplication. 此类可以是你想要创建的库更方便的协议的情况下很有用。This class can be useful if you want to create a more convenient protocol for a library. 例如，如果你的库的用户必须使用类似的语法`Scriptobj.SetProperty("Count", 1)`，可以提供能够使用更简单的语法，如`scriptobj.Count = 1`。For example, if users of your library have to use syntax like `Scriptobj.SetProperty("Count", 1)`, you can provide the ability to use much simpler syntax, like `scriptobj.Count = 1`. 您不能直接创建的实例`DynamicObject`类。You cannot directly create an instance of the `DynamicObject` class. 若要实现动态行为，您可能想要从继承`DynamicObject`类并重写必需的方法。To implement the dynamic behavior, you may want to inherit from the `DynamicObject` class and override necessary methods. 例如，如果您需要用于设置和获取属性的唯一操作，您可以只覆盖和方法。For example, if you need only operations for setting and getting properties, you can override just the and methods. 在 C# 中，若要启用动态行为的类的实例派生自`DynamicObject`类，必须使用`dynamic`关键字。In C#, to enable dynamic behavior for instances of classes derived from the `DynamicObject` class, you must use the `dynamic` keyword. 有关更多信息，请参见[使用类型 dynamic](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/types/using-type-dynamic.md)。For more information, see [Using Type dynamic](~/docs/csharp/programming-guide/types/using-type-dynamic.md). 在 Visual Basic 中，支持通过后期绑定动态操作。In Visual Basic, dynamic operations are supported by late binding. 有关详细信息，请参阅[早期绑定和后期绑定](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ff7f1e-b94f-4205-ab8d-5cfa91758724)。For more information, see [Early and Late Binding](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d6ff7f1e-b94f-4205-ab8d-5cfa91758724). 下面的代码示例演示如何创建派生自的类的实例`DynamicObject`类。The following code example demonstrates how to create an instance of a class that is derived from the `DynamicObject` class. ```csharp public class SampleDynamicObject : DynamicObject {} //... dynamic sampleObject = new SampleDynamicObject (); ``` ```vb Public Class SampleDynamicObject Inherits DynamicObject '... Dim sampleObject As Object = New SampleDynamicObject() ``` 此外可以向派生自的类添加您自己的成员`DynamicObject`类。You can also add your own members to classes derived from the `DynamicObject` class. 如果您的类定义属性，并且还将重写方法中，动态语言运行时 (DLR) 首先使用语言联编程序来查找类中的属性的静态定义。If your class defines properties and also overrides the method, the dynamic language runtime (DLR) first uses the language binder to look for a static definition of a property in the class. 如果不存在此类属性，DLR 调用方法。If there is no such property, the DLR calls the method. `DynamicObject`类实现了 DLR 接口，这样您就可以共享的实例`DynamicObject`支持 DLR 互操作性模型的语言之间的类。The `DynamicObject` class implements the DLR interface , which enables you to share instances of the `DynamicObject` class between languages that support the DLR interoperability model. 例如，可以创建的实例`DynamicObject`类在 C# 中，并将其传递给 IronPython 函数。For example, you can create an instance of the `DynamicObject` class in C# and then pass it to an IronPython function. 有关详细信息，请参阅[动态语言运行时概述](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/dynamic-language-runtime-overview.md)。For more information, see [Dynamic Language Runtime Overview](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/dynamic-language-runtime-overview.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果您有一个简单的方案中，您需要的对象，但是，只能添加和删除成员在运行时，不需要定义特定操作和不包含静态成员，则使用类。If you have a simple scenario in which you need an object that can only add and remove members at run time but that does not need to define specific operations and does not have static members, use the class. > > 如果你有更高级的方案需要在其中定义动态参与互操作性协议，或管理 DLR 快速动态调度缓存所需的对象，创建您自己的实现的接口。If you have a more advanced scenario in which you need to define how dynamic objects participate in the interoperability protocol, or you need to manage DLR fast dynamic dispatch caching, create your own implementation of the interface. ## Examples 假设您想要用于访问在字典中，以代替的书写的值提供替代语法`sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"`(`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"`在 Visual Basic 中)，您可以编写`sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`。Assume that you want to provide alternative syntax for accessing values in a dictionary, so that instead of writing `sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"` (`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"` in Visual Basic), you can write `sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`. 另外，您希望此语法以不区分大小写，以便`sampleDictionary.Text`等效于`sampleDictionary.text`。Also, you want this syntax to be case-insensitive, so that `sampleDictionary.Text` is equivalent to `sampleDictionary.text`. 下面的代码示例演示`DynamicDictionary`类，该类派生自`DynamicObject`类。The following code example demonstrates the `DynamicDictionary` class, which is derived from the `DynamicObject` class. `DynamicDictionary`类包含的对象`Dictionary`类型 (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)`在 Visual Basic 中) 来存储键 / 值对，并重写和方法，以支持新的语法。The `DynamicDictionary` class contains an object of the `Dictionary` type (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)` in Visual Basic) to store the key-value pairs, and overrides the and methods to support the new syntax. 它还提供了`Count`属性，其中显示了多少动态属性字典包含。It also provides a `Count` property, which shows how many dynamic properties the dictionary contains. [!code-csharp[System.Dynamic.DynamicObject#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.dynamicobject/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Dynamic.DynamicObject#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.dynamic.dynamicobject/vb/module1.vb#1)] 有关更多示例，请参阅[使用 DynamicObject 创建包装器](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=169008)C# 常见问题博客上。For more examples, see [Creating Wrappers with DynamicObject](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=169008) on the C# Frequently Asked Questions blog.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类可以重写此方法，以指定如何为动态对象执行二进制操作。Classes derived from the class can override this method to specify how binary operations should be performed for a dynamic object. 如果方法没有覆盖，语言运行时联编程序确定的行为。When the method is not overridden, the run-time binder of the language determines the behavior. （大多数情况下，将引发语言特定的运行时异常。）(In most cases, a language-specific run-time exception is thrown.) 当您使用二元运算，例如加法或乘法，调用此方法。This method is called when you have binary operations such as addition or multiplication. 例如，如果重写方法，它将自动调用语句，例如`sum = first + second`或`multiply = first*second`，其中`first`派生自`DynamicObject`类。For example, if the method is overridden, it is automatically invoked for statements like `sum = first + second` or `multiply = first*second`, where `first` is derived from the `DynamicObject` class. 可以通过获取有关二元运算类型的信息`Operation`属性的`binder`参数。You can get information about the type of the binary operation by using the `Operation` property of the `binder` parameter. 如果仅在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中使用动态对象`binder.Operation`属性可以从以下值之一枚举。If your dynamic object is used only in C# and Visual Basic, the `binder.Operation` property can have one of the following values from the enumeration. 但是，在 IronPython 或 IronRuby 等其他语言，可以具有其他值。However, in other languages such as IronPython or IronRuby, you can have other values. |“值”Value|描述Description|C#C#|Visual BasicVisual Basic| |-----------|-----------------|---------|------------------| |`Add`|加法运算不进行溢出检查，针对数值操作数。An addition operation without overflow checking, for numeric operands.|`a + b`|`a + b`| |`AddAssign`|加法复合赋值运算不进行溢出检查，针对数值操作数。An addition compound assignment operation without overflow checking, for numeric operands.|`a += b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`And`|按位`AND`操作。A bitwise `AND` operation.|`a & b`|`a And b`| |`AndAssign`|按位`AND`复合赋值运算。A bitwise `AND` compound assignment operation.|`a &= b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`Divide`|算术除法运算。An arithmetic division operation.|`a / b`|`a / b`| |`DivideAssign`|算术除法复合赋值运算。An arithmetic division compound assignment operation.|`a /= b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`ExclusiveOr`|按位`XOR`操作。A bitwise `XOR` operation.|`a ^ b`|`a Xor b`| |`ExclusiveOrAssign`|按位`XOR`复合赋值运算。A bitwise `XOR` compound assignment operation.|`a ^= b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`GreaterThan`|"大于"比较。A "greater than" comparison.|`a > b`|`a > b`| |`GreaterThanOrEqual`|"大于或等于"比较。A "greater than or equal to" comparison.|`a >= b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`LeftShift`|按位左移运算。A bitwise left-shift operation.|`a << b`|`a << b`| |`LeftShiftAssign`|一个按位左移复合赋值操作。A bitwise left-shift compound assignment operation.|`a <<= b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`LessThan`|"小于"比较。A "less than" comparison.|`a < b`|`a < b`| |`LessThanOrEqual`|"小于或等于"比较。A "less than or equal to" comparison.|`a <= b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`Modulo`|算术余数运算。An arithmetic remainder operation.|`a % b`|`a Mod b`| |`ModuloAssign`|算术余数复合赋值运算。An arithmetic remainder compound assignment operation.|`a %= b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`Multiply`|不进行溢出检查，针对数值操作数乘法运算。A multiplication operation without overflow checking, for numeric operands.|`a * b`|`a * b`| |`MultiplyAssign`|乘法复合赋值运算不进行溢出检查，针对数值操作数。A multiplication compound assignment operation without overflow checking, for numeric operands.|`a *= b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`NotEqual`|不是相等比较。An inequality comparison.|`a != b`|`a <> b`| |`Or`|按位或逻辑`OR`操作。A bitwise or logical `OR` operation.|`a | b`|`a Or b`| |`OrAssign`|按位或逻辑`OR`复合赋值。A bitwise or logical `OR` compound assignment.|`a |= b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`Power`|引发数字进行幂运算的数学运算。A mathematical operation of raising a number to a power.|不支持。Not supported.|`a ^ b`| |`RightShift`|按位右移运算。A bitwise right-shift operation.|`a >> b`|`a >> b`| |`RightShiftAssign`|一个按位右移复合赋值操作。A bitwise right-shift compound assignment operation.|`a >>= b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`Subtract`|减法运算不进行溢出检查，针对数值操作数。A subtraction operation without overflow checking, for numeric operands.|`a - b`|`a - b`| |`SubtractAssign`|减法复合赋值运算不进行溢出检查，针对数值操作数。A subtraction compound assignment operation without overflow checking, for numeric operands.|`a -= b`|不支持。Not supported.| > [!NOTE] > 若要实现`OrElse`(`a || b`) 和`AndAlso`(`a && b`) 的 C# 中的动态对象的操作，你可能想要实现这两方法和方法。To implement `OrElse` (`a || b`) and `AndAlso` (`a && b`) operations for dynamic objects in C#, you may want to implement both the method and the method. > > `OrElse`操作包含一元`IsTrue`操作和二进制`Or`操作。The `OrElse` operation consists of the unary `IsTrue` operation and the binary `Or` operation. `Or`仅当执行操作的结果`IsTrue`操作是`false`。The `Or` operation is performed only if the result of the `IsTrue` operation is `false`. > > `AndAlso`操作包含一元`IsFalse`操作和二进制`And`操作。The `AndAlso` operation consists of the unary `IsFalse` operation and the binary `And` operation. `And`仅当执行操作的结果`IsFalse`操作是`false`。The `And` operation is performed only if the result of the `IsFalse` operation is `false`. ## Examples 假设您需要的数据结构来存储文本和数值表达式的数字，并且你想要定义基本的数学运算，如加法和减法的此类数据。Assume that you need a data structure to store textual and numeric representations of numbers, and you want to define basic mathematical operations such as addition and subtraction for such data. 下面的代码示例演示`DynamicNumber`类，该类派生自类。The following code example demonstrates the `DynamicNumber` class, which is derived from the class. `DynamicNumber` 重写方法，以使数学运算。`DynamicNumber` overrides the method to enable mathematical operations. 它还重写和方法以允许对元素的访问。It also overrides the and methods to enable access to the elements. 在此示例中，支持仅加法和减法操作。In this example, only addition and subtraction operations are supported. 如果您尝试编写如下所示语句`resultNumber = firstNumber*secondNumber`，运行时异常。If you try to write a statement like `resultNumber = firstNumber*secondNumber`, a run-time exception is thrown. remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类可以重写此方法，以指定应如何执行类型转换为动态对象。Classes derived from the class can override this method to specify how a type conversion should be performed for a dynamic object. 如果方法没有覆盖，语言运行时联编程序确定的行为。When the method is not overridden, the run-time binder of the language determines the behavior. （大多数情况下，将引发语言特定的运行时异常。）(In most cases, a language-specific run-time exception is thrown.) 在 C# 中，如果重写此方法，它是自动调用时具有的显式或隐式转换，如下面的代码示例中所示。In C#, if this method is overridden, it is automatically invoked when you have an explicit or implicit conversion, as shown in the code example below. 在 Visual Basic 中，则支持仅显式转换。In Visual Basic, only explicit conversion is supported. 如果重写此方法，则调用它通过使用或函数。If you override this method, you call it by using the or functions. ```csharp // Explicit conversion. String sampleExplicit = (String)sampleObject; // Implicit conversion. String sampleImplicit = sampleObject; ``` ```vb // Explicit conversion - first variant. Dim testExplicit1 = CTypeDynamic(Of String)(sampleObject) // Explicit conversion - second variant. Dim testExplicit2 = CTypeDynamic(sampleObject, GetType(String)) ``` ## Examples 假设您需要的数据结构来存储文本和数值表达式的数字，并且你想要定义的此数据结构转换为字符串和整数。Assume that you need a data structure to store textual and numeric representations of numbers, and you want to define conversions of this data structure to strings and integers. 下面的代码示例演示`DynamicNumber`类，该类派生自类。The following code example demonstrates the `DynamicNumber` class, which is derived from the class. `DynamicNumber` 重写方法以启用类型转换。`DynamicNumber` overrides the method to enable type conversion. 它还重写和方法以允许访问的数据元素。It also overrides the and methods to enable access to the data elements. 在此示例中，支持仅转换为字符串和整数。In this example, only conversion to strings and integers is supported. 如果你尝试将对象转换为任何其他类型，则会运行时异常。If you try to convert an object to any other type, a run-time exception is thrown. remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类可以重写此方法，以指定应如何为动态对象执行操作用于获取成员值。Classes derived from the class can override this method to specify how operations that get member values should be performed for a dynamic object. 如果方法没有覆盖，语言运行时联编程序确定的行为。When the method is not overridden, the run-time binder of the language determines the behavior. （大多数情况下，将引发运行时异常。）(In most cases, a run-time exception is thrown.) 当有这样的语句时调用此方法`Console.WriteLine(sampleObject.SampleProperty)`，其中`sampleObject`是派生自的类的实例类。This method is called when you have statements like `Console.WriteLine(sampleObject.SampleProperty)`, where `sampleObject` is an instance of the class derived from the class. 此外可以向派生自的类添加您自己的成员`DynamicObject`类。You can also add your own members to classes derived from the `DynamicObject` class. 如果您的类定义属性，并且还将重写方法中，动态语言运行时 (DLR) 首先使用语言联编程序来查找类中的属性的静态定义。If your class defines properties and also overrides the method, the dynamic language runtime (DLR) first uses the language binder to look for a static definition of a property in the class. 如果不存在此类属性，DLR 调用方法。If there is no such property, the DLR calls the method. ## Examples 假设您想要用于访问在字典中，以代替的书写的值提供替代语法`sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"`(`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"`在 Visual Basic 中)，您可以编写`sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`。Assume that you want to provide alternative syntax for accessing values in a dictionary, so that instead of writing `sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"` (`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"` in Visual Basic), you can write `sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`. 此外，此语法必须不区分大小写，以便`sampleDictionary.Text`等效于`sampleDictionary.text`。Also, this syntax must be case-insensitive, so that `sampleDictionary.Text` is equivalent to `sampleDictionary.text`. 下面的代码示例演示`DynamicDictionary`类，该类派生自类。The following code example demonstrates the `DynamicDictionary` class, which is derived from the class. `DynamicDictionary`类包含的对象`Dictionary`类型 (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)`在 Visual Basic 中) 来存储键 / 值对，并重写和方法，以支持新的语法。The `DynamicDictionary` class contains an object of the `Dictionary` type (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)` in Visual Basic) to store the key-value pairs, and overrides the and methods to support the new syntax. 它还提供了`Count`属性，其中显示了多少动态属性字典包含。It also provides a `Count` property, which shows how many dynamic properties the dictionary contains. remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类可以重写此方法，以指定应如何为动态对象执行调用对象成员的操作。Classes derived from the class can override this method to specify how operations that invoke an object member should be performed for a dynamic object. 如果方法没有覆盖，语言运行时联编程序确定的行为。When the method is not overridden, the run-time binder of the language determines the behavior. （大多数情况下，将引发语言特定的运行时异常。）(In most cases, a language-specific run-time exception is thrown.) 如果重写此方法，它会自动被调用时执行等操作`sampleObject.SampleMethod(100)`，其中`sampleObject`派生自`DynamicObject`类。If this method is overridden, it is automatically invoked when you perform an operation like `sampleObject.SampleMethod(100)`, where `sampleObject` is derived from the `DynamicObject` class. 此外可以向派生自的类来添加你自己的方法类。You can also add your own methods to classes that are derived from the class. 例如，如果您重写方法中，动态调度系统首先会尝试确定在类中是否存在指定的方法。For example, if you override the method, the dynamic dispatch system first attempts to determine whether the specified method exists in the class. 如果找不到该方法，它将使用实现。If it does not find the method, it uses the implementation. 此方法不支持`ref`和`out`参数。This method does not support `ref` and `out` parameters. 中的所有参数`args`数组按值传递。All parameters in the `args` array are passed by value. ## Examples 假设您想要用于访问在字典中，以代替的书写的值提供替代语法`sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"`(`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"`在 Visual Basic 中)，您可以编写`sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`。Assume that you want to provide alternative syntax for accessing values in a dictionary, so that instead of writing `sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"` (`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"` in Visual Basic), you can write `sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`. 此外，你想要将无法在此字典上调用所有标准字典方法。Also, you want to be able to call all the standard dictionary methods on this dictionary. 下面的代码示例演示`DynamicDictionary`类，该类派生自类。The following code example demonstrates the `DynamicDictionary` class, which is derived from the class. `DynamicDictionary`类包含的对象`Dictionary`类型 (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)`在 Visual Basic 中) 来存储键 / 值对。The `DynamicDictionary` class contains an object of the `Dictionary` type (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)` in Visual Basic) to store the key-value pairs. 它将替代方法，以支持的方法类，并重写和方法，以支持新的语法。It overrides the method to support methods of the class and overrides the and methods to support the new syntax. 它还提供了`Print`方法，打印出所有字典键和值。It also provides a `Print` method, which prints out all dictionary keys and values. remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类可以重写此方法，以指定应如何为动态对象执行按索引访问的对象的操作。Classes derived from the class can override this method to specify how operations that access an object by index should be performed for a dynamic object. 如果方法没有覆盖，语言运行时联编程序确定的行为。When the method is not overridden, the run-time binder of the language determines the behavior. （大多数情况下，将引发语言特定的运行时异常。）(In most cases, a language-specific run-time exception is thrown.) 如果重写此方法，它则会自动调用具有等操作`sampleObject[3] = 10`C# 中或`sampleObject(3) = 10`在 Visual Basic 何处`sampleObject`派生自类。If this method is overridden, it is automatically invoked when you have an operation like `sampleObject[3] = 10` in C# or `sampleObject(3) = 10` in Visual Basic, where `sampleObject` is derived from the class. ## Examples 假设你想要创建的对象属性可以访问通过名称如`Property0`， `Property1`，依此类推，或按索引，以便，例如，`sampleObject.Property0`等效于`sampleObject[0]`C# 中或`sampleObject(0)`在 Visual Basic 中。Assume that you want to create an object in which properties can be accessed either by names such as `Property0`, `Property1`, and so on, or by index, so that, for example, `sampleObject.Property0` is equivalent to `sampleObject[0]` in C# or `sampleObject(0)` in Visual Basic. 下面的代码示例演示`SampleDynamicObject`类，该类派生自类。The following code example demonstrates the `SampleDynamicObject` class, which is derived from the class. `SampleDynamicObject`类包含的对象`Dictionary`类型 (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)`在 Visual Basic 中) 来存储键 / 值对。The `SampleDynamicObject` class contains an object of the `Dictionary` type (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)` in Visual Basic) to store the key-value pairs. `SampleDynamicObject` 重写和方法以允许按索引访问。`SampleDynamicObject` overrides the and methods to enable access by index. 它将替代和方法以允许访问按属性名称。It overrides the and methods to enable access by property name. remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类可以重写此方法，以指定应如何为动态对象执行操作，将值设置为成员。Classes derived from the class can override this method to specify how operations that set a value to a member should be performed for a dynamic object. 如果方法没有覆盖，语言运行时联编程序确定的行为。When the method is not overridden, the run-time binder of the language determines the behavior. （大多数情况下，将引发语言特定的运行时异常。）(In most cases, a language-specific run-time exception is thrown.) 当有这样的语句时调用此方法`sampleObject.SampleProperty = "Test"`，其中`sampleObject`是派生自的类的实例类。This method is called when you have statements like `sampleObject.SampleProperty = "Test"`, where `sampleObject` is an instance of the class that is derived from the class. 此外可以向派生自的类添加您自己的成员`DynamicObject`类。You can also add your own members to classes derived from the `DynamicObject` class. 如果您的类定义属性，并且还将重写方法中，动态语言运行时 (DLR) 首先使用语言联编程序来查找类中的属性的静态定义。If your class defines properties and also overrides the method, the dynamic language runtime (DLR) first uses the language binder to look for a static definition of a property in the class. 如果不存在此类属性，DLR 调用方法。If there is no such property, the DLR calls the method. ## Examples 假设您想要用于访问在字典中，以代替的书写的值提供替代语法`sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"`(`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"`在 Visual Basic 中)，您可以编写`sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`。Assume that you want to provide alternative syntax for accessing values in a dictionary, so that instead of writing `sampleDictionary["Text"] = "Sample text"` (`sampleDictionary("Text") = "Sample text"` in Visual Basic), you can write `sampleDictionary.Text = "Sample text"`. 此外，此语法必须不区分大小写，以便`sampleDictionary.Text`等效于`sampleDictionary.text`。Also, this syntax must be case-insensitive, so that `sampleDictionary.Text` is equivalent to `sampleDictionary.text`. 下面的代码示例演示`DynamicDictionary`类，该类派生自类。The following code example demonstrates the `DynamicDictionary` class, which is derived from the class. `DynamicDictionary`类包含的对象`Dictionary`类型 (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)`在 Visual Basic 中) 来存储键 / 值对，并重写和方法，以支持新的语法。The `DynamicDictionary` class contains an object of the `Dictionary` type (`Dictionary(Of String, Object)` in Visual Basic) to store the key-value pairs, and overrides the and methods to support the new syntax. 它还提供了`Count`属性，其中显示了多少动态属性字典包含。It also provides a `Count` property, which shows how many dynamic properties the dictionary contains. remarks.format: ## Remarks 类派生自类可以重写此方法以指定应如何为动态对象执行一元运算。Classes derived from the class can override this method to specify how unary operations should be performed for a dynamic object. 如果方法没有覆盖，语言运行时联编程序确定的行为。When the method is not overridden, the run-time binder of the language determines the behavior. （大多数情况下，将引发语言特定的运行时异常。）(In most cases, a language-specific run-time exception is thrown.) 一元求反、 递增，如操作或减少时，调用此方法。This method is called when you have unary operations such as negation, increment, or decrement. 例如，如果重写方法，语句，例如自动调用此方法`negativeNumber = -number`，其中`number`派生自类。For example, if the method is overridden, this method is automatically invoked for statements like `negativeNumber = -number`, where `number` is derived from the class. 可以通过获取有关一元运算类型的信息`Operation`属性的`binder`参数。You can get information about the type of the unary operation by using the `Operation` property of the `binder` parameter. 如果仅在 C# 和 Visual Basic 中使用动态对象`binder.Operation`属性可以从以下值之一枚举。If your dynamic object is used only in C# and Visual Basic, the `binder.Operation` property can have one of the following values from the enumeration. 但是，在 IronPython 或 IronRuby 等其他语言，可以具有其他值。However, in other languages such as IronPython or IronRuby, you can have other values. |“值”Value|描述Description|C#C#|Visual BasicVisual Basic| |-----------|-----------------|---------|------------------| |`Decrement`|一元递减运算。A unary decrement operation.|`a--`|不支持。Not supported.| |`Increment`|一元递增运算。A unary increment operation.|`a++`|不支持。Not supported.| |`Negate`|算术求反。An arithmetic negation.|`-a`|`-a`| |`Not`|逻辑非运算。A logical negation.|`!a`|`Not a`| |`OnesComplement`|的求补。A ones complement.|`~a`|不支持。Not supported.| |`IsFalse`|一个 false 的条件的值。A false condition value.|`a && b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`IsTrue`|一个条件为真值。A true condition value.|`a || b`|不支持。Not supported.| |`UnaryPlus`|一元加号。A unary plus.|`+a`|`+a`| > [!NOTE] > 若要实现`OrElse`(`a || b`) 和`AndAlso`(`a && b`) 的 C# 中的动态对象的操作，你可能想要实现这两方法和方法。To implement `OrElse` (`a || b`) and `AndAlso` (`a && b`) operations for dynamic objects in C#, you may want to implement both the method and the method. > > `OrElse`操作包含一元`IsTrue`操作和二进制`Or`操作。The `OrElse` operation consists of the unary `IsTrue` operation and the binary `Or` operation. `Or`仅当执行操作的结果`IsTrue`操作是`false`。The `Or` operation is performed only if the result of the `IsTrue` operation is `false`. > > `AndAlso`操作包含一元`IsFalse`操作和二进制`And`操作。The `AndAlso` operation consists of the unary `IsFalse` operation and the binary `And` operation. `And`仅当执行操作的结果`IsFalse`操作是`false`。The `And` operation is performed only if the result of the `IsFalse` operation is `false`. ## Examples 假设您需要的数据结构来存储文本和数值表达式的数字，并且你想要定义此类数据算术求反运算。Assume that you need a data structure to store textual and numeric representations of numbers, and you want to define a mathematical negation operation for such data. 下面的代码示例演示`DynamicNumber`类，该类派生自类。The following code example demonstrates the `DynamicNumber` class, which is derived from the class. `DynamicNumber` 重写方法，以使算术求反运算。`DynamicNumber` overrides the method to enable the mathematical negation operation. 它还会覆盖和方法以允许对元素的访问。Is also overrides the and methods to enable access to the elements. 在此示例中，支持仅算术求反运算。In this example, only the mathematical negation operation is supported. 如果您尝试编写如下所示语句`negativeNumber = +number`，则会发生运行时异常。If you try to write a statement like `negativeNumber = +number`, a run-time exception occurs.
